A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A cluttered mess of a movie whose great exposition of the force is marred by fundamentally flawed structure\, flow\, and humor that's tonally off. Luke is excellently played by Mark Hamil\, and his interactions with Rey are the highlight of the movie. But the rest of the cast are such bungling failures--with no redeeming character arc--that this movie drags at a Bantha's pace.
